Uses of Package
drcl.intserv

Packages that use drcl.intserv
drcl.intserv   
drcl.intserv.scheduler   
 

Classes in drcl.intserv used by drcl.intserv
Admission
          This class is equipped on Scheduler to enable runtime admission control on defines a unified interface for other protocols (such as QoS-based routing and resource management protocols) to make/modify/release a reservation, and to access installed reservations.
QoSRequirement
          The QoS included is listed below: End-to-End Delay Inter-Destination Jitter Inter-Packet Jitter Minimum Bandwidth Packet Loss Rate
Scheduler
          The information unit a scheduler deals with in our architecture is "flow".
SchedulerConfig
          The SchedulerConfiguration contract.
SpecAd
           
SpecFlow
           
SpecR
           
 

Classes in drcl.intserv used by drcl.intserv.scheduler
Admission
          This class is equipped on Scheduler to enable runtime admission control on defines a unified interface for other protocols (such as QoS-based routing and resource management protocols) to make/modify/release a reservation, and to access installed reservations.
QoSRequirement
          The QoS included is listed below: End-to-End Delay Inter-Destination Jitter Inter-Packet Jitter Minimum Bandwidth Packet Loss Rate
RspecTranslator
          RspecTranslator resides in an end system (e.g., the "QoS Broker") to translate the QoS requirement and the path Adspec originating from the sender to the Rspec, which is then used by the resource management protocol to set up the resource along the path.
Scheduler
          The information unit a scheduler deals with in our architecture is "flow".
